properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT REWARD_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_NICKNAME, MEM_GRADE_NAME, REWARD_DATE, NVL(REWARD_REASON, '-') AS REWARD_REASON, REWARD_SCORE, SUM(REWARD_SCORE) OVER(PARTITION BY MEM_NO ORDER BY REWARD_NO ASC) AS REWARD_SUM FROM TB_MEMBER M JOIN TB_REWARD R USING (MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER_GRADE MG ON (M.MEM_GRADE = MG.MEM_GRADE_NO) WHERE M.MEM_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY R.REWARD_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
